verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the tax-gatherers and the <S%G268>sinners<s%> were <S%G1448>coming<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> Him to <S%G191>listen<s%> to Him.

And <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> [began] to <S%G1234>grumble,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4327>receives<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> and <S%G4906>eats<s%> with them."
And He <S%G3004>told<s%> them <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> you, if he <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> and has <S%G622>lost<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, does not <S%G2641>leave<s%> the ninety-nine in the <S%G2048>open<s%> <S%G2048>pasture,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> the one which is <S%G622>lost,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> he <S%G2147>finds<s%> it?
"And when he has <S%G2147>found<s%> it, he <S%G2007>lays<s%> it on his <S%G5606>shoulders,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoicing.<s%>

"And when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3624>home,<s%> he <S%G4779>calls<s%> <S%G4779>together<s%> his <S%G5384>friends<s%> and his <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G4796>'Rejoice<s%> with me, for I have <S%G2147>found<s%> my <S%G4263>sheep<s%> which was <S%G622>lost!<s%>'

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you that in the <S%G3779>same<s%> <S%G3779>way,<s%> there will be [more] <S%G5479>joy<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> who <S%G3340>repents,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> ninety-nine <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>persons<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3341>repentance.<s%>

<S%G2228>"Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1406>silver<s%> <S%G1406>coins<s%> and <S%G622>loses<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1406>coin,<s%> does not <S%G681>light<s%> a <S%G3088>lamp<s%> and <S%G4563>sweep<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> and <S%G2212>search<s%> <S%G1960>carefully<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> she <S%G2147>finds<s%> it?

"And when she has <S%G2147>found<s%> it, she <S%G4779>calls<s%> <S%G4779>together<s%> her <S%G5384>friends<s%> and <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4796>'Rejoice<s%> with me, for I have <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1406>coin<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I had <S%G622>lost!<s%>'

"In the <S%G3779>same<s%> <S%G3779>way,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, there is <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> who <S%G3340>repents.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons;<s%>

and the <S%G3501>younger<s%> of them <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G3962>'Father,<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> me the <S%G3313>share<s%> of the <S%G3776>estate<s%> that <S%G1911>falls<s%> to me.' And he <S%G1244>divided<s%> his <S%G979>wealth<s%> <S%G1244>between<s%> them.

"And not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>later,<s%> the <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> and <S%G589>went<s%> on a <S%G589>journey<s%> into a <S%G3117>distant<s%> <S%G5561>country,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G1287>squandered<s%> his <S%G3776>estate<s%> with <S%G811>loose<s%> <S%G2198>living.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> when he had <S%G1159>spent<s%> <S%G3956>everything,<s%> a <S%G2478>severe<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in that <S%G5561>country,<s%> and he <S%G757>began<s%> to be in <S%G5302>need.<s%>

"And he <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2853>attached<s%> himself to <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4177>citizens<s%> of that <S%G5561>country,<s%> and he <S%G3992>sent<s%> him into his <S%G68>fields<s%> to <S%G1006>feed<s%> <S%G5519>swine.<s%>

"And he was <S%G1937>longing<s%> to <S%G1072>fill<s%> his <S%G2836>stomach<s%> with the <S%G2769>pods<s%> that the <S%G5519>swine<s%> were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1325>giving<s%> [anything] to him.

"But when he <S%G2064>came<s%> to his <S%G1438>senses,<s%> he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G4214>'How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> of my father's <S%G3407>hired<s%> <S%G3407>men<s%> <S%G4052>have<s%> <S%G4052>more<s%> <S%G4052>than<s%> <S%G4052>enough<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> but I am <S%G622>dying<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> with <S%G3042>hunger!<s%>

'I will <S%G450>get<s%> up and <S%G4198>go<s%> to my <S%G3962>father,<s%> and will <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and in your <S%G1799>sight;<s%>

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> your <S%G5207>son;<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> me as <S%G1520>one<s%> of your <S%G3407>hired<s%> <S%G3407>men.<s%> "'

"And he <S%G450>got<s%> up and <S%G2064>came<s%> to his <S%G3962>father.<s%> But while he was <S%G2089>still<s%> a <S%G3112>long<s%> <S%G3112>way<s%> <S%G568>off,<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> him, and <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> [for him,] and <S%G5143>ran<s%> and <S%G1968>embraced<s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5137><s%> him, and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him.

"And the <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3962>'Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and in your <S%G1799>sight;<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> your <S%G5207>son.<s%>'

"But the <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> <S%G5035>'Quickly<s%> <S%G1627>bring<s%> out the <S%G4413>best<s%> <S%G4749>robe<s%> and <S%G1746>put<s%> it on him, and <S%G1325>put<s%> a <S%G1146>ring<s%> on his <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G5266>sandals<s%> on his <S%G4228>feet;<s%>
and <S%G5342>bring<s%> the <S%G4618>fattened<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> <S%G2380>kill<s%> it, and let us <S%G2068>eat<s%> and be <S%G2165>merry;<s%>

for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1473>mine<s%> was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and has <S%G326>come<s%> to <S%G326>life<s%> <S%G326>again;<s%> he was <S%G622>lost,<s%> and has been <S%G2147>found.<s%>' And they <S%G757>began<s%> to be <S%G2165>merry.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> his <S%G4245>older<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> was in the <S%G68>field,<s%> and <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G1448>approached<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4858>music<s%> and <S%G5525>dancing.<s%>
"And he <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G3816>servants<s%> and [began] <S%G4441>inquiring<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> might be.

"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'Your <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2240>has<s%> <S%G2240>come,<s%> and your <S%G3962>father<s%> has <S%G2380>killed<s%> the <S%G4618>fattened<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he has <S%G618>received<s%> him <S%G618>back<s%> <S%G5198>safe<s%> and <S%G5198>sound.<s%>'
"But he became <S%G3710>angry,<s%> and was not <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> in; and his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out and [began] <S%G3870>entreating<s%> him.

"But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2400>'Look!<s%> For <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I have been <S%G1398>serving<s%> you, and I have <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G3928>neglected<s%> a <S%G1785>command<s%> of <S%G4771>yours;<s%> and [yet] you have <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> me a <S%G2056>kid,<s%> that I might be <S%G2165>merry<s%> with my <S%G5384>friends;<s%>

but <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G4771>yours<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> who has <S%G2719>devoured<s%> your <S%G979>wealth<s%> with <S%G4204>harlots,<s%> you <S%G2380>killed<s%> the <S%G4618>fattened<s%> <S%G3448>calf<s%> for him.'
"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, ['My] <S%G5043>child,<s%> you have <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1510>been<s%> with me, and <S%G3956>all<s%> that is <S%G1699>mine<s%> is <S%G4674>yours.<s%>

'But we <S%G1163>had<s%> to be <S%G2165>merry<s%> and <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G4771>yours<s%> was <S%G3498>dead<s%> and [has begun] to <S%G2198>live,<s%> and [was] <S%G622>lost<s%> and has been <S%G2147>found.<s%>' "
